description: This file defines the CategoriesViewModel class for managing category data within the app's categories screen. It interacts with the NotesRepository to observe and modify categories.

classes.name: CategoriesViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel class for managing categories data for the Categories screen, leveraging AndroidViewModel and Kotlin Coroutines.

methods.name: addCategory
methods.description: Adds a new category with the specified name and optional color by launching a coroutine that interacts with the repository.

methods.name: deleteCategory
methods.description: Deletes an existing category by launching a coroutine that calls the repository's delete method.
